meanings.definition: A brand name for a common over-the-counter antihistamine medication used to treat allergies and allergic reactions.
meanings.sent1: After getting stung by a bee, I took some benadryl to reduce the swelling.
meanings.sent2: My doctor recommended benadryl to help with my seasonal allergies.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook my dog's benadryl for my own allergy medication!
meanings.sent4: The benadryl worked like magic, calming my skin irritation in no time.
meanings.sent5: The bright pink color of the benadryl tablets made them easy to spot in the medicine cabinet.

meanings.definition: To take or administer Benadryl for relief of allergy symptoms.
meanings.sent1: I will benadryl myself before going to the park to avoid sneezing.
meanings.sent2: She benadryls her children before they visit their grandma's house with cats.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to be allergic to humans, so we decided to benadryl it.
meanings.sent4: He benadryled his way through the pollen-filled garden without any issues.
meanings.sent5: Remember to benadryl yourself before playing with your friend's pet rabbit.
